entities.description: The type of weapon or lack thereof an arrestee was armed with.
Arrestee was armed with a firearm.
Arrestee was armed with an automatic firearm.
Arrestee was armed with a handgun.
Arrestee was armed with an automatic handgun.
Arrestee was armed with a rifle.
Arrestee was armed with an automatic rifle.
Arrestee was armed with a shotgun.
Arrestee was armed with an automatic shotgun.
Arrestee was armed with another type of firearm.
Arrestee was armed with a lethal cutting instrument.
Arrestee was armed with club, blackjack, or brass knuckles.
Range of survey variable values, including minimum and maximum.

relationships.description: Indicates the weapon status or type of weapon an arrestee was armed with.
Defines the range of values for survey variables, including minimum and maximum values.
Relates the survey to the cases with missing data.
